name: tenoxui
description: Tenox UI is a Utiliy-First CSS Framework with small and lightweight size and fast, most of its class is builded in Javascript.

scripts.mini-js: terser src/js/index.js src/js/color.js -o dist/js/index.min.js --mangle && terser src/js/property.js -o dist/js/property.js && cp src/js/index.js src/js/color.js dist/js/
scripts.mini-css: cleancss src/css/index.css -o dist/css/index.min.css && cp src/css/index.css dist/css/

author: nousantx
